snoopy.blindnote: U36C is predicted to guide the 2'O-ribose methylation of 28S rRNA A3703. (These comments was copied from snoRNABase)(http://www-snorna.biotoul.fr/plus.php?id=U36C) . (20100706末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20120412吉浜）locusの配列が変わったので、snoRNA positionを変更しました。
snoopy.evidence: Nicoloso, M., Qu, L. H., Michot, B., and Bachellerie, J. P. (1996). Intron-encoded, antisense small nucleolar RNAs: the characterization of nine novel species points to their direct role as guides for the 2'-O-ribose methylation of rRNAs. J Mol Biol, 260, 178-195.
